description:
USN-4221-1 fixed a vulnerability in libpcap. This update provides
the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM.

Original advisory details:

 It was discovered that libpcap did not properly validate PHB headers in
 some situations. An attacker could use this to cause a denial of service
 (memory exhaustion).

libpcap.description: Library for for user-level network packet capture

title: libpcap vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary:
Applications using libpcap could be made to crash if given specially
crafted data.
